name: Agony (itch) (Neugh)
description:
It's a wip game

in alpha .19

there are elements added by me (3d models) and template to demonstrate my Game design skills

I will be very grateful to receive feedback.

enjoy

You are in a very familiar place.

an old room

 you hear sounds outside

You must escape from the entity that, when approaching, produces static in your head.

There are a series of puzzles
